profile.title: Profayili ya Mutirhisi
profile.mustLogin: U fanele ku nghena ku vona swilaveko leswi hlawuriweke.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Kombisa ya khale ni leyi hundzuluxiwaka
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Kombisa ya khale ni ya hundzuluxiwaka swin’we
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Tisekonde ku fikela loko swi susiwa hi otomatiki
profile.saveError: Xihoxo: a swi kotekanga ku hlayisa swilaveko.
profile.avatarError: Ku na xihoxo loko ku hlayisiwa xifaniso.
profile.noPrivateKey: Ku hava keyi yo hlayisa eka xitirhisiwa lexi.
profile.setBackupPassword: Veka phasiwedi ku sirhelela bekhapu ya wena:
profile.importSuccess: Keyi leyi yimayekiwile yi nghenisiwile eka xitirhisiwa lexi.
profile.importFailed: Ku nghenisa keyi swi tsandzekile (phasiwedi yo hoxeka kumbe fayili yi onhiwile).
profile.keysRotated: Makhiyi laman’wha ma endleke naswona keyi ya mani yi uploadiwe.
profile.exportKey: Rhumela keyi ya wena ya le xihundleni
profile.importKey: Nghenisa bekhapu leyi sirhelelekeke ya keyi
profile.keyDisclaimer: Keyi ya wena ya le xihundleni a yi pfuki yi humile eka xitirhisiwa lexi. Rhumela kopi leyi sirhelelekeke ku yi vuyisela eka xitirhisiwa xin’wana.
profile.themeFreeNotice: U tirhisa Free — tirhisa minkombiso ya Dyambu/Nyenyana laha hansi. Pfuxeta ku pfula minkombiso yin’wana.
profile.sunTheme: Tirhisa minkombiso ya vusiku bya makumu
profile.moonTheme: Tirhisa minkombiso ya vusiku bya nkarhi wa misinya (Midnight)
profile.backupTitle: Bekhapu leyi sirhelelekeke & Ku fambisana ka xitirhisiwa
profile.backupDesc: Endla bekhapu leyi sirhelelekeke hi phasiwedi, u tlhela u yi vuyisela eka xitirhisiwa xin’wana ku fambisana.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Hlakutsa loko app yi nga tirhisiwi
profile.notifyOnCopy: Ndzi tivisa loko rungula ra mina ri kopiwi
profile.unfollowFailed: Ku tshika ku landzela swi tsandzekile
profile.followHint: Matimu ya vona ma ta vonaka eka feed ya wena loko va rhumela eka lava va landzeriweke kumbe va le ka mani.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Ku humelerile xihoxo eka xiphemu lexi.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Rhumela mavonelo ni marungula lama nghenaka eka foni kumbe imeyili leyi tiyisiweke. Mavonelo/marungula lama humaka ma nga kombisa nomboro ya wena ya Chatforia.
profile.destinationPhoneForCalls: Nomboro ya le ku endzeni ya mavonelo (E.164)
profile.aliasBridging: Ku rhumela mavonelo (ku hlanganisa ka vito rin’wana)
profile.quietHoursOptional: Nkarhi wa ku rhula (hi ku rhandza)

chat.selectPrompt: Hlawula rungula kumbe xitlawa xa rungula ku sungula ku vulavula
